nodes.text: The home of Elscol Loro's parents was located in the town of Tamarack on the planet Cilpar. The building was destroyed in 4 ABY when it was struck by a direct hit during an attack on Tamarack by Imperial Moff Boren Tascl, with Loro holding the person who let slip the house's location to the Imperials responsible for "betraying [her] personally."
